title: NLCS: Bryce Harper Leads Phillies to World Series
description: Harper’s two-run homer in the bottom of the eighth inning erased a one-run deficit and put Philadelphia back in the Fall Classic for the first time since 2009.
dc:creator: Scott Miller
media:credit: Eric Hartline/USA Today Sports, via Reuters
media:description: Bryce Harper’s two-run home run in the eighth inning put Philadelphia ahead to stay in Game 5 of the National League Championship Series on Sunday.
